name: Battle for Dasos
description:
A side story from the Exoginos galaxy. Made for the Save the Environment Game Jam 2018-19!

Play as Kayden, a fashionable boy who works for the Supernova clothing brand. Their boss, Daymon, has bought the green planet Dasos to expand his empire; one of the few green planets left on their side of the galaxy.

Will you take the chance to save Dasos?

~ CREDITS ~
art and story by NeonStarchild
made with Twine 2

*Katharos and Amaritian are an original alien species by NeonStarchild.
Wiki - https://celestial-bond.fandom.com/wiki/Celestial_Bond_Wiki
